name: dry food for cats
title: Vital Balance Sensitive · dry food for cats · Turkey & rice
description: Vital Balance dry food for cats Turkey & rice Duactis - Sensitive

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition:Turkey (18%), rice (15%), maize, maize gluten meal, dried turkey protein, pea protein concentrate, animal fat, soya meal, dried chicory root (natural fibres 2%), minerals, digest (with added heat treated Lactobacillus Delbrueckii and Fermentum powder 0.025%), yeast, fish oil.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 35 000; Vit D3: 1 100; Vit E: 680mg/kg: Vit C: 160; Taurine: 750; Ferrous sulphate monohydrate: 210; Calcium iodate anhydrous: 2.7; Cupric sulphate pentahydrate: 42; Manganous sulphate monohydrate: 101; Zinc sulphate monohydrate: 360; Sodium selenite: 0.25With antioxidants

usageInformation.usage: Good stool texture with 24% (Purina Research) reduced odor in only 14 days, thanks to natural fibres, Limited number of protein sources supports feed tolerance, High digestibility thanks to high quality ingredients, Made with tasty ingredients to stimulate your cat's appetite, Healthy skin and shiny coat supported by Omega 6 fatty acids and zinc.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Purina VITAL BALANCE ACTELIOS is a special formula developed by Purina's nutritionists and veterinarians that contains: Prebiotics have been proven to support a balanced intestinal flora, antioxidants help improve natural cell regeneration, yeast helps support natural defenses, and these 3 ingredients help support natural defenses. The high-quality Purina VITAL BALANCE ACTELIOS recipes are available in a wide range of tasty varieties.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Water facilitates the elimination of waste from the organism. The more your cat will drink, the more her urine will be diluted and less irritating, which will help limit the formation of urinary stones.Make sure to always leave a bowl of fresh and clean water at her disposal.Recommended daily amount (g/day):Cat weight:Quantity: The recommended daily amounts should be adjusted to weather conditions, the cat’s level of activity and its physical condition. Clean, fresh drinking water should be available at all times. Optional addition to feeding instruction for monolingual packagings:If you feed PURINA ONE for the first time, we recommend to make the change gradually by mixing an increasing amount of PURINA ONE with your cat’s current food for 7 days period to allow your cat’s digestive system to adapt to the change.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Die empfohlenen täglichen Mengen sollten sich je nach Wetter,  dem Aktivitätslevel der Katze und ihrem physischen Allgemeinzustand richten. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte jederzeit zur Verfügung stehen.
